Class Style

java.lang.Object
com.hado90.config.style.Style
All Implemented Interfaces:
Config
public class Style extends Object implements Config
Style class implements the Config interface to manage configuration settings related to style. The class loads configurations from a JSON file and provides methods to get and set style-specific configuration values.

  • Method Details

    • loadConfig

      public void loadConfig(String configFilePath)
      Loads configuration values from the specified JSON file. The file is expected to contain key-value pairs where keys correspond to StyleKey enum values.
      Specified by:
      loadConfig in interface Config
      Parameters:
      configFilePath - the relative path to the JSON configuration file.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the specified configuration file cannot be found.

    • getConfigValue

      public static String getConfigValue(String key)
      Retrieves the configuration value associated with the specified key. The key is expected to be one of the defined StyleKey enum values.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to retrieve the configuration value for.
      Returns:
      the configuration value associated with the key, or null if the key is invalid.

    • setConfigValue

      public void setConfigValue(String key, String value)
      Sets a configuration value for the specified key. The key must already exist in the configuration, as new keys cannot be added after the configuration has been loaded.
      Specified by:
      setConfigValue in interface Config
      Parameters:
      key - the key for which the value should be set.
      value - the new value to set for the configuration key.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if attempting to add a new key to the configuration.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the key is invalid.
